channel.title: What would you say to the haters of HL2?
channel.description:
What would you say to the haters of Half-Life 2? Come on. You know, the little kids who go around to some random forum first chance they get and haven't even played the game and rage about it! Tell everyone what you think of these "people". :rage::freeman:
Something glitched below...No clue...
Oh, and don't forget whining about steam and how "steam sucks". Steam has gotten shit tons better, I always liked it anyway. Easy as hell to use and connects people. The only tiny little thing I could possibly bitch about is the constant maintenance. But I am not an impatient fuck bag.

item.title: What would you say to the haters of HL2?
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
Hate is a strong, misguided word. Lets all be friends and kill the HL haters in harmony, mkay? Emergency crowbars activated!

Read full topic

item.title: What would you say to the haters of HL2?
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
sersoft:

If you force Halo fans or CoD fans to complete Half Life 2, then Ep1, then Ep2, then Portal, then HL1/BS/OPForce, they become HL fans and stop playing Halo/Cod. I tested that theory and it works on 2/3 of the population.

Impossible, COD fanboys don’t play anything except COD.

Read full topic

item.title: What would you say to the haters of HL2?
item.dc:creator: MarshmallowRadiation
item.description:
CoD fans: Halo sucks! Grrrrrrrrrr
Halo fans: CoD sucks! Grrrrrrrrrr
HL fans: Hi, can I join in without getting ripped to shreds?
CoD and Halo fans: NO!!!
HL fans: Fine then, you can get all the press while we slowly sink into the dark pit of cult classic-dom. Thanks for abandoning us, Valve.

Read full topic

item.title: What would you say to the haters of HL2?
item.dc:creator: DEATH_eVADER
item.description:
MarshmallowRadiation:

And the HL Hater Haters are called CoD fans, and none of them have ever heard of HL, excluding any of you rare exceptions out there.

I’m a CoD fan, but I’ll always will be a HL fan, I’m not a Halo fan though, tried to be a fan but I just can’t find myself to be one.

item.title: What would you say to the haters of HL2?
item.dc:creator: Chickenprotector
item.description:
Deadline99:

then when hl2 came out i beat it and the episodes. then years later i got hl1 and beat it. Hl2 was awesome till i beat the origional.

I beat the original first, liked both. I was hugely disappointed with there being no “big ass boss fight” like there was in HL1, but what can you do. Still up there in my game lists, I have about 100 hours on it alone.

EP1 annoyed me because it was too short I beat the puzzles easily. EP2 was a lot tougher because it was after I figured out how to increase the monster HP/damage to give me more of a challenge. As a result, a lot tougher, a lot longer, and more enjoyable. Even with the very crappy AI.

Over all there are a few things they could’ve improved, but only to an extent.
I give it a 7/10 for gameplay, etc (first time around) after I ramped up the NPC health & damage 9/10 it became a lot tougher and more fun as a result.

– topic

I say: “you ever played the game?”
If yes: “Why?”
If no: “Play it first.”
After that, I’d just shrug and walk away.

Read full topic
item.source: What would you say to the haters of HL2?
